--- title: "Compute & Storage Resources at SLU" format: html: theme: cosmo toc: true toc-depth: 3 --- # Access to Compute and Storage Resources This page provides an overview of how to apply for compute and storage resources through NAISS/SUPR, what systems are available, how to manage your allocation, and where to get support. ## How to Apply
Step 1: Apply for a NAISS/SUPR Account Step 2: Apply for Resources via \"SLU Local 2025\" Step 3: Access After Approval
## Available Systems The following systems can be requested: - **Pelle**: compute resources. Can be applied for individually, or with additional storage on Gorilla. - **Gorilla**: active project storage. Can be applied for individually, or in an application together with a compute project on Pelle. - **Lutra**: long term storage. Needs to be applied for in a separate application from Pelle and/or Gorilla. ## Termination of Allocations Allocations on Pelle and Gorilla can be requested for up to a year at a time. If needed, they can be renewed for up to another year at a time. You will be getting an e-mail that reminds you that the end of the allocation is getting closer. Once no longer needed, you can simply not request a prolongation of your project. Storage allocations on Lutra will be granted for four years at a time. Questions pending confirmation: - Is termination handled through SUPR? Yes, should be automatic. **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** - Is a one‑month notice period required? Again, that should be automatic - if no resources are used none are billed. **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** - Should users notify NAISS, SLU IT, or both? Sounded like they don't have to notify anyone, just not use the allocations anymore. **[MORE INFO NEEDED]** ## Pricing Billing follows the NAISS/Uppmax pricing model, but will be send out, and paid to SLU-IT. ## Pricing The table below is fetched directly from the [UPPMAX Terms and fees](https://www.uu.se/en/centre/uppmax/get-started/terms-and-fees) page:. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

Please remember that Lutra is sold in increments of 50 TB, at 4 year minimum. #### Storage on Lutra - Data volume: **50 TB** - Price: **500 SEK per TB-year** - Calculation: *50 TB × 500 SEK/TB-year* - **Annual storage cost: 2,500 SEK** ## Payment Process You will be invoiced for the resources your are using, not for the ones you have allocated.
